labels.label:
-- Create the IFC_TEST_SOURCE_TBL table with uppercase column names
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[IFC_TEST_SOURCE_TBL](
    [LOANNO] INT PRIMARY KEY,
    [BRANCHCODE] VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    [SAMITYCODE] NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    [FIRSTNAME] VARCHAR(35) NULL,
    -- Add other columns as needed
    [INACTIVEDATE] SMALLDATETIME NULL
) ON [PRIMARY];

-- Insert 100 sample records into the IFC_TEST_SOURCE_TBL table with uppercase column names (using placeholder values)
INSERT INTO [dbo].[IFC_TEST_SOURCE_TBL] ([LOANNO], [BRANCHCODE], [SAMITYCODE], [FIRSTNAME], [INACTIVEDATE])
SELECT TOP 100
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS LOANNO,
    'Branch' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS VARCHAR(5)) AS BRANCHCODE,
    'Samity' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS NVARCHAR(5)) AS SAMITYCODE,
    'FirstName' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS VARCHAR(5)) AS FIRSTNAME,
    DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)), '2022-01-01') AS INACTIVEDATE
FROM master.dbo.spt_values;

IN ORACLE DATAWAREHOUSE DB SERVER IP 192.168.1.1x

-- Create the Account table without a primary key
CREATE TABLE Account (
    AccountID NUMBER,
    Username VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL,
    Balance NUMBER(10,2) NOT NULL
);

-- Insert 5 sample records into the IFC_TEST_SOURCE_TBL table
INSERT INTO [dbo].[IFC_TEST_SOURCE_TBL] ([LoanNo], [BranchCode], [SamityCode], [FirstName], [InActiveDate])
VALUES
    (1, 'Branch1', N'Samity1', 'John', '2022-01-01'),
    (2, 'Branch2', N'Samity2', 'Jane', '2022-02-01'),
    (3, 'Branch3', N'Samity3', 'Alice', '2022-03-01'),
    (4, 'Branch4', N'Samity4', 'Bob', '2022-04-01'),
    (5, 'Branch5', N'Samity5', 'Eve', '2022-05-01');
